work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Currently selling the suite of OpenTable products to an assigned territory with a concentration in Chicago, Minneapolis, and Milwaukee. Utilize a consultative approach to communicate the features and benefits of OpenTable products and services. Solid understanding of OpenTable Electronic Reservation Book and its competitive advantages. Proficient understanding of salesforce.com CRM application and pipeline management.
highlights: Promoted to Sales Representative from Sales Coordinator within first 6 months of employment.
Met or exceeded monthly, quarterly, and yearly quota for calendar year 2012(125%), 2013(108%) and 2015(100%).

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed a $50M portfolio of real estate properties. Represented investors, developers and business owners in leasing residential and commercial space. Financial reporting and owner summaries for 700 units of mixed multifamily and commercial properties.
highlights: Increased company profile with existing client base while networking extensively to forge new alliances to provide multi-faceted real estate services.
Developed and negotiated specific project plans for new builds and remodels.
Managed and trained a team of 6 sales, maintenance, and housekeeping personnel.
Organized, hosted and led company sponsored events.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Represented preferred developers and multi-unit operators including The University of Canterbury, New Zealand. Directed and managed a portfolio of 100+ units of university housing. Rent collection and financial reporting to operators.
highlights: Updated new and expired documentation as needed.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for managing and retaining existing relationships and generating new business in the Business Banking market segment. Cross-sold bank products, executed strategies with calls and site visits; provided needs assessment, customer qualification and meeting follow-up to maintain, enhance and expand customer relationships. Serviced the credit and non-credit financial needs of existing clients.
highlights: Personally interviewed applicants, and closed various types of SBA loans.
Managed all aspects of location and cultivation of new deposits and loans.
Analyzed call logs and sales numbers in compliance with targeted sales quotas.
